CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, pg. 14 reads: "Home Service Fair Prize-Winners, Demonstrator - Prize-winners at the four sessions of the Courier's 1953 Home Service Fair were so numerous that it would be impossible for the Courier to print pictures of all of them. However, here are pictures of just a few who won prizes...In the center photo, Mrs. Mattie Handy, demonstrator for the Courier's thirteen Home Service Fairs this year, is shown on stage with her Crosley kitchen which she used at all shows...All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Mattie Handy standing at sink in demonstration kitchen with Crosley Appliances, on stage in Ammon Recreation Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Kitchen appliances--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stages (Platforms)--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
